data.meta_description: Robert Ford | December 14, 2023 & Columbus, OH | Robert A. Ford, age 61, passed...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Robert Ford | Jerry Spears Funeral Home
data.text:
Robert A. Ford, age 61, passed away on Thursday, December 14, 2023 at his residence. He was a proud retired Veteran of The United States Army. Preceded in death by, parents. Robert and Mary Ford. Survived by, son, Robert, sisters, Barbara, Lucinda, Kathleen and Pam, brothers, Chuck and Jimmy, numerous other family and friends. Friends may call at JERRY SPEARS FUNERAL HOME, 2693 W. Broad St., Wednesday, December 20, 2023 from 5-7 PM. Graveside service and interment, Thursday, December 21, 2023, 9 AM at Dayton National Cemetery.

To send flowers to the family, please visit our floral store.
